name: Straight Through My Heart
content: In the lights I heard the loudest noise
骤然间，我听见一个巨大的响声
A gunshot on the floor oh oh
我低下头，发现我的衣衫已经浸红
Felt her lips on my neck and her voice
颈上却有人在温柔地亲吻
I can't stop the bleeding oh
She aimed and she shot me
我想是她已经俘虏了我的心
I just can't believe it oh
I just can't escape this love
Straight through my heart soldier down
直入心脏般的感觉，她已侵入我心
My heart soldier down my heart
Thought I moved more than on
Thought I could fool her charm
But I can't leave her alone oh oh
Hear the sound of a love so loud
我从没来如此强烈的感觉
And she wants me wants me tonight
就像子弹直入我的心脏
I can't stop the bleeding oh
She aimed and she shot me
I just can't believe it oh
I just can't escape this love
Straight through my heart soldier down
直入我的心脏，她已侵入我心
My heart soldier down my heart
In the lights I heard the loudest noise
邹然间，我听见一个巨大的响声
A gunshot on the floor oh oh
I can't stop the bleeding oh
She aimed and she shot me
I just can't believe it oh
I just can't escape this love
Straight through my heart soldier down
直入我的心脏，她已侵入我心
My heart soldier down my heart
Straight through my heart soldier down
直入我的心脏，她已侵入我心
My heart my heart my heart
My heart soldier down my heart
